p: In this research, the antigenotoxic effects of extracts of the examined Lamiaceae species are presented for the first time on a prokaryotic model. The knowledge gained on bacterial model systems can often be successfully applied in more complex higher organisms ( Žegura et al., 2006, Rea et al., 2010), which is the reason of our assessing of the plant extracts’ potential on this model. The results are expected to contribute to further studies on the DNA protecting effects of plant extracts.
